name: Block Cube Line Up
description:
Block Cube Line Upis a classic yet innovative game! Simply Drag the blocks, and fill up all grids.
Very easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
This block puzzle game has intense battles with friends for matching the cool jewel building blocks. The ultimate goal is to destroy full lines on the screen horizontally.
FEATURES
- Simple rules and Easy control
- Many new nice cubes
- Attractive effects and easy controls
